title: Womens Dress

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful sweater
items.body: The sizing chart provided by the company was correct and the first picture of the blue sweater is the correct shade and it's a very pretty shade. I got a small but I think an XS might have been good. They were sold out if that size in blue. My suggested size was a large but that was way too big. This review is about the size small. I will say I love this blue color. It looked like the photos. It's a nice thick, comfy, quality sweater. I really wanted to keep it and it's definitely my vibe but sadly it just didn't look flattering on me. Maybe if I were stick skinny it might have. I have a large chest (39-40 inches) depending on my bra. I wore this with leggings but it still made me look top heavy and big. I'm not big, I'm average as is my BMI. I even wore something very tight underneath to try and compensate for the bagginess but it didn't work. It's a beautiful well made sweater. Sadly the cut and the way it falls just isn't for me but it might be for you. I'm rating it on the quality of the shirt and not on the fact that it didn't look good on me personally. Read more
items.author: AJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look and feel!
items.body: Love the look and feel! Light and soft, perfect for a pair of jeans and the cute dress in wearing to a wedding. I ordered a medium and it is a perfect wrap fit. I have a bigger bust and a large top. Pleasantly surprised! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute cut and color
items.body: Bought two of them in the medium size in black and the red bean paste color. Very nice, flattering shape. Hopefully the material relaxes a bit over time with wash and wear, so it’s not as stiff and has even more of a slouchy feel. It’s not the softest. I do wish that it had pockets. That would’ve been awesome. All in all a good purchase though. I would recommend this product. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality, phenomenal fit, and so many compliments!
items.body: Holy compliments y'all. I tend to stick to gray and black in my wardrobe and when I caught this on sale I almost caved and went with my default. The green, however, really caught my eye and I am so glad it did. Every time I wear this I get so many compliments. Not sure what all the other reviewers got that earned so many bad reviews because mine is EXACTLY like the photo and the quality is better than anything I've got at Target or JCPenney. I do see some people mistakenly are wearing it upside down which could be some of the issue. I guess just make sure you are aware which way it goes? lol Anywho, I got the green in medium (it fits me exactly like the model which never happens) and love it so much. It's my new favorite article of clothing and have to resist wearing it twice a week. Will probably wind up buying one in black and maybe the dark gray or navy blue because it adds a lot of versatility to my wardrobe and warmth during the 8 months of winter we get. For reference my measurements are: 5' 9", 140lbs, 34B, 36" hips, 31" waist, 32" inseam, pants size 6, dress size 6-8, unisex tees S-M. Read more
items.author: Rhianna Sullivan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality and price
items.body: I really wanted to love these sweaters. I am 5'3', 105,-110 lbs. I find the medium suits me the best, however, the red/orange is more orangey. I had ordered the arm green and dark gray. I looked like a grandpa, I am referring about myself. If I was younger, I could get by with those darker colors. I did get the yellow and white, I am happy, in medium for a slouchy look. Read more
items.author: T.A.G. AMAZONIAN

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not even close to what I was expecting
items.body: I would give this 0 stars if I could. The material is cheap and is not warm. The collar is so big and unflattering. I returned it immediately Read more
items.author: MaryJane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
items.body: Decent heaviness and it hugs your but so no showing anything. Will be purchasing another in a different color Read more
items.author: Joni C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it now!!!
items.body: I don’t leave reviews. Ever. I came back to leave this one. This is the best, cutest most comfortable sweater ever. Soft. Machine wash and dry. I bought three colors and I want more. Read more
items.author: SuperLoJo

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red / Orange, Dark Grey, Z-2-brown, Army Green, Hot Pink, Z-3-red Bean Paste, Black, Teal Blue, Navy Blue, Brick Red, Z-1-blue, Khaki, White, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
